1328030.name: Need for Speed™ Payback: MINI John Cooper Works Countryman and Infiniti Q60 S Bundle
1328030.description:
Need for Speed™ Payback: MINI John Cooper Works Countryman & Infiniti Q60 S Bundle

Two hot new cars: The second generation of the MINI Countryman is the biggest and most versatile model in the entire range of the tradition-steeped British brand. The Infiniti Q60 is a premium sports coupe that combines expressive design with exhilarating performance and dynamics. Drive them both now with the Need for Speed™ Payback: MINI John Cooper Works Countryman & Infiniti Q60 S Bundle!
